sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function StudentInfo({ student }) { const fullName = `${student.masterUser?.lastName || "-"}, ${student.masterUser?.firstName || "-"}`; return (
{/* NIM dan username */}

{student.nim || "-"} / {student.noRegistration || "-"}

{/* Kiri */}

{fullName}

Jurusan

{student.major?.majorName || "-"}

Fakultas

{student.major?.faculty?.facultyName || "-"}

{/* Kanan */}
Beasiswa yang Diikuti

{student.scholarshipType || "-"}

Tanggal Pendaftaran

{formatDate(student.createdAt)}

); }
